attributes.action: Make land,Internet, mobile lines essential & ban providers from restricting them
attributes.additional_details: in these times as we have seen with the lockdowns & hardships, active communication lines are not a luxury they are an essential service & the restriction/suspension of them pose a real life threatening risk to people & organisations, for example even the government departments for jobs and benefits are utilising mobile communications (mobile numbers & internet/email) to keep in touch with claimants, if those services are restricted people can be hurt or worse because they cannot communicate
attributes.background: Add legislation that stops companies that provide communications lines to people such as BT, Three, O2, Virgin etc. From being able to restrict or disconnect the line/service if the account holder falls behind in payments for a genuine reason or crisis situation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568543

We could accept a petition calling for all communications to be protected in the way requested by the above petition, but you would need to provide your full name.
